column4: Hi there, im on U10.10 and im trying to install a few things. But got a broken pack error. Is there an easy way to solve this, becasue synaptic gives me 100's of packs listed as broken... and i don't really want to remove all of them
in synaptic package manager under the Edit menu I believe is a "fix broken packages" option
did you try the synaptic  "Fix broken packages"  option?
